name: [ really proud. regret nothing ]
description:
[ really proud. do not regret ] 

@desu_mello @Laisarre 

The goal of this game is to defeat the monsters and collect pride and regret points. To search for philosophical goal of your life, finding the right way! though, we kinda of running out of time\\ however, we are still horribly proud that we are done. that we have started a game together and we are able to upload at least something right now. 

Hope you will enjoy <\3  

just short interface-info: 

• you can jump with a [space] 

• you can collect the keys and open the doors if you press [E] 

• you will be able to turn on ‘aura’ after 5 points to \pride or \regret by pressing [T] or [Y] 

||| originally it was supposed to be a platormer with some elements of rpg. we are still planning to finish it, and yup, it is a little bit shorter then we have planned. Like three thousand times shorter ‘D but anyway, we've done it. From the beginning to the …compiling end :D
